title: AQS 1 Specification Sheet: Outdoor Particulate and Gas Monitor
summary: The AQS 1 is an outdoor real-time monitor designed for environmental professionals to measure particulates (PM1, PM2.5, PM4, PM10, TSP) and up to three gases (O3, NO2, CO, SO2, H2S, CH4, VOCs) simultaneously. It is purpose-built for outdoor use with features like remote communications and automated flow control.
